column1: Uchi////Lovely food with some interesting combinations offered. Each plate is unique with an amazing amalgamation of flavors in every bite. Succulent
column2: delectable and absolutely fantastic food. As most of the reviewers have mentioned
column3: brussel sprouts and the fried milk are a must have. I would also recommend the sake and the hama chilli. I liked almost everything that we had ordered. Good service with fresh and delicious food. If you haven't tried it yet
column4: schedule a visit ASAP. Good experience with some fantastic flavor combinations happening.
